channel.title: Posts on Vitaly Velikodnyi - Senior Software Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Vitaly Velikodnyi - Senior Software Engineer

item.title: I've Passed CKAD Exam
item.author: vvelikodny@gmail.com (Vitaly Velikodnyi)
item.description: I’ve successfully passed the Certified Kubernetes Application Developer exam (CKAD) last Sunday. It took me about 1 week to review all thing either I already know or forgot, train different setups on Kubernetes.

item.title: Email from Uber
item.author: vvelikodny@gmail.com (Vitaly Velikodnyi)
item.description: Sometimes interesting things happen. It was about two years ago I worked on a project with Cadence framework and contributed to uber/cadence open-source project on Github. Today I’ve received the email from Uber Technical Sourcer:

item.title: My Everyday International Calls Buddy
item.author: vvelikodny@gmail.com (Vitaly Velikodnyi)
item.description: Project Management is a huge amount of tasks from super interesting to routine ones. To be effective, I always try to optimize my workflow, and you should. Many people ignore it to try to save some time today, but really don’t know how much time and energy they will save tomorrow.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.author: vvelikodny@gmail.com (Vitaly Velikodnyi)
item.description: Hello! I’m Vitaly. Software Engineer from Russia, Gopher. It’s my first post here just to say “hello” to all of you guys: human beings and robots! I will write here for a human being, but if you are a robot you are welcome too.
